sentences.sContent: Milrinone combined with vasopressin improves cardiac index after cardiopulmonary resuscitation in a pig model of myocardial infarction.
sentences.sContent_eng: Milrinone combined with vasopressin improves cardiac index after cardiopulmonary resuscitation in a pig model of myocardial infarction.
sentences.sCn: 米力龙复合抗利尿激素增加心肌梗塞模型猪的心肺复苏后心脏指数。

remMethod.val: re(重新) ＋ sus(下) ＋ cit ＋ at + ion(名词性后缀) → 重新从下面激活 → 恢复

words.tran: 使复活的人；人工呼吸器
